0001_hello-world.title: #1 - Hello World - Welcome to My Interactive Blog!
0001_hello-world.excerpt: Welcome to my personal blog! This is my first interactive post where I share my thoughts and introduce myself with interactive components.

0002_getting-started-with-nextjs.title: #2 - Getting Started with Next.js 14 - Interactive Guide
0002_getting-started-with-nextjs.excerpt: A comprehensive interactive guide to building modern web applications with Next.js 14, featuring hands-on examples and interactive components.

0003_interactive-components-showcase.title: #3 - Interactive Components Showcase - The Power of MDX
0003_interactive-components-showcase.excerpt: Explore the full potential of interactive blog content with this showcase of all available interactive components.

0004_syntax-highlighting-demo.title: #4 - Beautiful Code Syntax Highlighting with Shiki
0004_syntax-highlighting-demo.excerpt: Experience VS Code-quality syntax highlighting in your blog with Shiki. Learn how to display beautiful code examples across multiple programming languages.

0005_react-series-01_introduction.title: #5 - React Mastery: Part 1 - Introduction
0005_react-series-01_introduction.excerpt: Begin your React journey with this comprehensive introduction to modern React development.

0006_react-series-02_components.title: #6 - React Mastery: Part 2 - Components
0006_react-series-02_components.excerpt: Deep dive into React components, props, and state management.

0007_react-series-03_hooks.title: #7 - React Mastery: Part 3 - Hooks
0007_react-series-03_hooks.excerpt: Master React Hooks and learn how to build custom hooks for your applications.
